title: Definitions
context: ยง128D-32 Definitions. As used in this part, unless the context otherwise requires: &ldquo;Prospective purchaser&rdquo; means a prospective owner, operator, tenant, developer, lender, or any other party who would not otherwise be liable under section 128D-6, prior to a voluntary response action being conducted. &ldquo;Requesting party&rdquo; means the person or persons submitting an application to conduct a voluntary response action. &ldquo;Voluntary response action&rdquo; means a response conducted voluntarily by a requesting party. [L 1997, c 377, pt of ยง2; am L 2005, c 133, ยง2]
